channel.title: Delta clean up: Objects
channel.description:
So if anyone knows Delta like I do. EVERYTHING is located in the client.java I don't feel like learning PI just yet but I want to make my Delta the best I can. I want to start with objects because well they are by far the clunkiest besides commands. Now I do have a objects.cfg but for some reason it doesn't work. It probably needs to be re-wrote into the server but that is the part I don't know. How do you add it in, and is there a way to change how the Object cfg works?
At the top of mine it says: [code]//------ClsdID---XCoord--YCoord--CDir----OpenID--OpenX---OpenY---ODir [/code]
Now I want to change it to something like what my objects currently look like (but without the makeGlobalObject, and not in client.java) which is something like this: [code]makeGlobalObject(2525, 4639, 2111, -3, 10); // Mining Rock[/code] That means it would look like this on top of the Object.cfg: [code]------XCoord--YCoord--ClsdID--CDir--(and what ever the 10 is.)[/code]
I don't know if just changing what it says at the top will in fact change what it puts out. But I'd like to know. Please and thank you :)

item.title: Delta clean up: Objects
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude462 sk8rdude462
item.description:
@sk8rdude462 wrote:

[quote=“RandQm, post:2, topic:423948”]objects are handled in client.java,
So if u want to make it in a new file, u prob should have to make a java file to like Objects.java
Else u have to use a code to load the .cfg, maybe take a look how npc.cfg or others are imported and try to make a code based of that.[/quote]

You didn’t even read anything I said did you?

Read full topic

item.title: Delta clean up: Objects
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

objects are handled in client.java,
So if u want to make it in a new file, u prob should have to make a java file to like Objects.java
Else u have to use a code to load the .cfg, maybe take a look how npc.cfg or others are imported and try to make a code based of that.
